mapper.insert: insert into resale (num, qty, id, period, re_date) values(#{num}, #{qty}, #{id}, #{period}, #{re_date})
mapper.select: select r.re_num, r.num, r.qty, r.id, r.period, r.re_date, m.point from resale r join member m on r.id = m.id where re_date = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
select r.re_num, r.num, p.name, r.qty, r.id, r.period, r.re_date from resale r join product p on r.num = p.num order by r.re_date
select p.image, p.name, p.price, r.qty, r.id, r.re_date from resale r join product p on r.num = p.num where id = #{id}
